title: Old diaries, 1881-1901 /
author: Gower, Ronald Sutherland
snippet: Mine host introduced me to his new son-in-law, young " Monty " Erskine, who married a year or two ago Miss Florence Flower— a very pleasing, handsome fellow. The two Flower sons, Archie and Fordham, and three daughters were the party, Mrs Edgar being away at Millhill. _ Shakespeare's Day followed.
